profile:
The Eavestrough Company has been in business for 16 years and we have more than 60 years of combined experience in the field. This has earned us a superior reputation for quality and professionalism.

We are members of the Better Business Bureau and we have won Best Eavestrough and Siding Company in the Burlington/Oakville area in 2013, 2014, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, and 2022. These awards were based on our phenomenal reviews about our outstanding workmanship and client experiences by homeowners who hired us to work on their homes.

The Eavestrough Company serves Burlington, Oakville, Mississauga, Niagara, Cambridge, and Hamilton area installing eavestrough, fascia, soffit, siding and leaf guard systems. Our experience and expertise has earned us one of the best reputations in the Golden Horseshoe area. If you want a job that is done to perfection and at a fair price, give The Eavestrough Company a call today at (905) 966-2564 or visit our website at www.theeavestroughcompany.com

https://www.facebook.com/theeavestroughcompany/
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1cDkBnuLFYhmVRcL5gKzqg

profile: Siding, Stucco, Stone, Brick, Masonry and Fireplaces From design to installation, Stone Selex Design is a premier company with over 20 years of experience providing both residential and commercial customers with quality installation and a high level of customer satisfaction. Stone Selex Design is committed to providing full service installation for your exterior or interior stone veneer project. We also provide installation of stone veneer, stucco, brick, masonry and fireplace transformations. Design your own project with the NEW Stone Veneer Visualizer and have Stone Selex Design install it for you. The Visualizer gives you the ability to envision your project from the comfort of your computer screen. It has the power to transform a photo of your home into a professional digital rendering by adding siding, stucco and stone. Make your home the talk of the neighbourhood with stone and stucco, or stone and brick, or siding and brick, stone tile and wood siding. The possibilities of style and colour combinations are endless. A Stone Selex Design project manager will help you with each stage of your project from where to add stone, stucco, siding, brick and masonry and provide you with a quote for our installation services provided by our experienced masonry installers. If it’s a fireplace that you want to create or just simply add stone or masonry, Stone Selex Design and the visualizer can help you with this too. While you are in the planning stages of your fireplaces transformation the visualizer is a great tool to use. Look through photos for ideas and see what others are doing and then come to Stone Selex Design and ask us to install it for you. Visit us here: https://twitter.com/StoneSelex https://www.facebook.com/StoneSelexInc/

profile:
Dear Customer,
Fix Aluminum Inc. is operating in GTA (Greater Toronto Area). Toronto, North York, Etobicoke, East York, Scarborough, Pickering, Ajax, Markham, Richmond Hill, Vaughan, Newmarket, Whitchurch-Stouffville, Mississauga, Oakville, Milton, Brampton, Caledon, Halton Hills since 1992.

We offer a variety of aluminum work such as: 

1.	Eavestrough  (5” &  6” – Half Round – Copper)
2.	Downpipes (2x2 – 3x3 – 3x4) with Elbows.
3.	Leaf Guards (Alu-rex and all other products)
4.	Soffit (Deluxe Vented Panels & Solid Plain Panels)
5.	Fascia (6” -  8” and all other custom sizes)
6.	Siding (Vinyl & Aluminum)
7.	Copper
8.	Capping or Cladding
9.	Flashing or Drip Edge
10.	Doors & Windows (Frame Capping)

We offer Free Estimates.	
We offer the most competitive and best price that matches our craftsmanship.
We do not subcontract our work therefore our own installation crews will do the work for you.
Our installation crews are highly trained professionals with many years of experience.
We use the best materials in market. Our suppliers are Gentek and Kaycan.

10 years warranty on labor.
25 years warranty on materials.
WSIB Insured, Bonded and Licensed.

We're social here: https://www.facebook.com/fixaluminum
services:
1.	Eavestrough  (5” &  6” – Half Round – Copper)

4.	Soffit (Deluxe Vented Panels & Solid Plain Panels)
5.	 Fascia (6” -  8” and all other custom sizes)
6.	Siding (Vinyl & Aluminum)
7.	Copper

9.	Flashing or Drip Edge
10.	Doors & Windows (Frame Capping)

profile:
We Provide Professional Home Exterior Services

Serving Toronto and GTA, Kresic Aluminum is one of Ontario's best home exterior service providers. For over 5 years and 5,000 projects our friendly technicians have been getting the job done right - and it's always guaranteed! We proudly offer a 5-year guarantee on installations and 2-year guarantee on repairs. You can trust us to care for your property like it is our own!
products:
For gutter seals we use best on market Kop-R-Lastic® Sealant wich is a one-part, highly elastic, high-performance thermoplastic sealant. The sealant exhibits excellent adhesion to a variety of construction materials. It can be applied to wet or dry surfaces and has excellent low temperature flexibility
For every aluminum installation we use matching colored screws
We also use multiple aluminum and siding supliers such as KAYCAN Ltd., GENTEK, etc.
services: We service residential homes, condos, housing complexes, and commercial buildings in and around GTA
specialities:
Eavestrough/Gutter/Downspouts installation and repairs
Siding/Soffit/Fascia installation and repairs
warranty_terms: 5 years on installations and 2 year warranty on repairs
